name: forese
description: The official website of the FORum for Economic Studies by Engineers (FORESE)

scripts.copyfiles: copyfiles -f pdf/* dist/pdf && copyfiles -f img/* dist/img && copyfiles -f img/members/2nd/* dist/img/members/2nd && copyfiles -f img/members/3rd/* dist/img/members/3rd && copyfiles -f img/members/4th/* dist/img/members/4th && copyfiles -f img/mockimg/* dist/img/mockimg
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin aptitudeTest.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aptitudeTest.html && usemin groupDiscussion.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/groupDiscussion.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfiles && npm run usemin

author: Nilesh D
